verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Knowing peace, God's Peace
We ought understand
And joy, the Lord's joy
That strengthens me on every hand

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come on with
Knowing the Almighty God is my father
And that he loves me
Knowing all of this I know
He’ll meet my need

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
God will supply
all of my needs
all of my needs
God will supply
all of my needs
all of my needs
God will supply
all of my needs
Knowing all of this, I know he’ll meet my need.
